pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Calculate Climate Targets for Financial Portfolios // These tools help you to assess if a financial portfolio aligns with climate goals. They summarize key metrics attributed to the portfolio (e.g. production, emission factors), and calculate targets based on climate scenarios. They implement in R the last step of the free software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment; https://2degrees- investing.org/). Financial institutions use 'PACTA' to study how their capital allocation impacts the climate.
